Hello Babel!

Run

// transpiled in /public/main.js const reduceArrow = function (arr = [1, 2, 3]) { return arr.reduce((acc, val) => acc + val, 0) } reduceArrow()

=>

Commands availables:

  • $ npm run build

    Compile de project with Babel

  • $ npm run babel-watch

    Compile de project with Babel and watch for changes

  • $ npm run live-server

    Run live-server on the project root

  • $ npm run server-watch

    Run live server on the project and watch for changes

  • $ npm start

    Compile de project with Babel and run live-server

  • $ npm run watch

    Setup development environment: npm run babel-watch && npm run server-watch

For more info see package.json
